member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.EnterResizeMode
member.summary: Puts the control into resizable mode.

remarks.para: In this mode, the control manages scrolling so that as the size of pages and the overall size of the content area changes, visible pages remain in place.

The control sets a hook on the window procedure to intercept the WM_ENTERSIZEMOVE and WM_EXITSIZEMOVE messages. However, if your application cancels this behavior, then the control will not be able to switch to resizable mode and manipulate scrolling. In this case, you must call the , and methods yourself.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.LoadDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Open and load a PDF document from a file.
member.param: Path to the PDF file (including extension)
A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

remarks.note: With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.LoadDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the PDF document from the specified stream.
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to load. The stream must support seeking.
A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

note.para: The application should maintain the stream resources being valid until the PDF document close.

With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.LoadDocument(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Loads the PDF document from the specified byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing the PDF document to load.
A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

note.para: The application should maintain the byte array being valid until the PDF document close.

With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.CloseDocument
member.summary: Close and dispose of a loaded PDF document.

remarks.para: This method sets the property to null, but does not dispose of the document if it was loaded manualy instead of using the method.
If you created an instance of the class and manualy assign it to the property, then you should dispose of the document yourself after checking that the document can be disposed.

member.name: F:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.IsReadOnlyProperty
member.summary: Identifies dependency property for
member.remarks: This dependency property is read-only and is synchronized with the corresponding property of the underlying class in only one direction. Changing the value of the property in the class will change the value of the dependency property. Since the UWP does not actually support read-only dependency properties, changing the value of this dependency property will cause desynchronization with the underlying class.

member.name: F:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.DocumentProperty
member.summary: Identifies dependency property for

remarks.para: This dependency property is synchronized with the corresponding property of the underlying class. Changing the value of the dependency property will change the value of the property in the class, and vice versa, changing the value of the property in the class will change the value in the dependency property.
remarks.note:
Please note
The OneWay binding would be disabled if you set the Document property with a document what is not from the binding source. More explanations can be found here
The TwoWay binding does not allow you to set the Document property with the document what is not from a binding source.

member.name: E:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.GameLoopStarting
member.summary: Occurs on the game loop thread just before the game loop starts.
member.remarks: This event is the first chance that an application has to execute code on the game loop thread.

member.name: E:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.GameLoopStopped
member.summary: Occurs on the game loop thread just after the game loop stops.
member.remarks: This event is the last chance an application has to execute code before the game loop thead exits.

member.name: E:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.Update
member.summary: Hook this event to update any data, as necessary, for your app's animation.
member.remarks:
The Update event is raised on a timed interval, based on the target elapsed time. It doesn't get raised if the control is paused.
The Update event is raised on the game loop thread.

member.name: E:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.Draw
member.summary: Hook this event to draw the contents of the control.
member.remarks:
The Draw event is raised any time its contents need to be redrawn. Reasons it may be raised are:
One or more Update events have been raised
The control's size has changed
The control's clear color has changed
The Draw event is raised on the game loop thread.

member.name: P:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.HasGameLoopThreadAccess
member.summary: Gets whether the current thread is the game loop thread.

member.name: P:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.IsFixedTimeStep
member.summary: Indicates whether the game loop is running in fixed or variable timing mode.
member.remarks: This property can be accessed from any thread.

member.name: P:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.Paused
member.summary: Indicates whether the control's game loop is paused.
member.remarks: This property can be accessed from any thread.

member.name: P:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.ReadyToDraw
member.summary: Gets whether the control is in a state where it is ready to draw.
member.remarks: This control is ready to draw when a device has been created and all CreateResources event handlers have completed successfully. This property may only be accessed from XAML's UI thread.

member.name: P:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.TargetElapsedTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time between Update events
member.remarks:
The default is 1/60th of a second.
This property may be accessed from any thread.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.Invalidate
member.summary: Marks this control as requiring redrawing.
member.remarks:
When =false, the control will redraw anyway and so calling has no effect. However, when =true, the control will not normally redraw itself. Calling will cause the control to schedule a without an .
This method can be called from any thread.
Multiple calls to between events are coalesced.
Be aware, though, that the event will not be raised. This opens up the possibility of a occurring before the first if the control is created with =true.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.GameLoop.RunOnGameLoopThreadAsync(System.Action,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Schedules the provided to run asynchronously on the game loop thread.
member.param: Callback for call.
An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the operation. This object is passed to the delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An instance that references the asynchronous request.

file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

remarks.note: With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.IViewerMethods.CloseDocument
member.summary: Close and dispose of a loaded PDF document.

remarks.para: This method sets the property to null, but does not dispose of the document if it was loaded manualy instead of using the method.
If you created an instance of the class and manualy assign it to the property, then you should dispose of the document yourself after checking that the document can be disposed.
